mapper.select: select i.interested_area_id , i.user_id , i.dongcode , d.dong from interested_area as i left outer join dongcode as d on i.dongcode = d.dongcode and i.user_id = #{userId};

select commercial_info_id , shopname , localname , IFNULL(jibun_address, road_address) as address , lng , lat , codename1 as large_category , codename2 as small_category from commercial_info where dongcode = #{dongcode};
